name: Ohio Simulator
description:
Welcome to Ohio Simulator! In this game, you try to survive as long as you can in the post-apocalyptic place known as Ohio. 

Features:

  • Make decisions to advance the story
  • Collect food to not starve
  • Frequently repair your home so it doesn't collapse
  • Trade with people who come by your door
  • Join a cult
  • Join the police department
  • Collect and wear hats
  • Die
  • And Much More!

Controls:

Use Y/N to make decisions (If you put something other than those, it will default to no)

Click the Hat Information button to change hats.

Credits:

Made by Platypus Games

Song: Ohio Simulator Theme

Thumbnail Text: cooltext.com

Update Log:

v.1.00: Release

v.1.1.0: Added ability to join police, fixed glitches
